message.body: Looks like u were right
Hi. I'm out in the deli for a piece of chocolate. How U today?
I am very sleepy at work
Long night yesterday
I know why I am. Up til 2 again. So I got (another) coffee w.my chocolate.
Was it worth it?
Yea I guess so. But I'm no kid anymore and need my sleep
Oh too bloody true for me too. -o- (that's supposed to be a big yawn that closes my eyes)
How is the linguistic data going?
Aaaaaagh. I've found some of my printouts on my desk & am typing the documents in again. Grumble.
y wrote in English. Oh, and Poul Anderson, can't forget him! Also Danish to US.
Oh, about those authors I listed. They're all American science fiction & fantasy authors. Well, Pohl was Danish, I think, or born there, but he certainl
I have a Dr appt after work but I am so sleepy I want to reschedule
board (an independent Apple store). Afterward we were both pretty tense, so we went for gelato.
Last night the gelato. Son called me: "My laptop's touch pad is screwy, I can't use it at all." So the whole evening went to a emergency trip to Spring
Dr.: Ecch. Yeah, reschedule of you have to. But then, how long till the next opening?
Did they fix it?
Its a chiropractor so soon most likely
about $100, too much, and Similar for a loaner. He was going to try to use his old one. If not, I'll lend him mine when I'm not using it.
No, he had to leave it there. It's new (Dec.) & under Applecare warranty. But 3-5 business days to diagnose; in the queue I guess. "Express" service is
t there & back again safely.
Oh, if you're in pain or have trouble moving, don't prolong that! Only reason I can think of (giving advice is easy) would be if you're too sleepy to ge
I rescheduled. I'm having probe on my computer too but I dun think I got warranty coverage
t Hein) We shall have to evolve Problem-solvers galore, For each problem they solve Creates ten problems more.
